node.statement: (Convergence of the renormalized part) As eps -> 0, Psi_eps^{ren}(phi) converges in probability under mu to Psi^{ren}(phi) = 4 lambda integral psi :phi^3: dx - 6 lambda integral psi^2 :phi^2: dx + 4 lambda <psi^3, phi> + <(-Delta+m^2)psi, phi>. This convergence holds because: the smeared Wick powers converge (by the regularity theory for Wick powers on T^3) and the remaining terms are continuous linear functionals of phi. The limit Psi^{ren}(phi) is a well-defined random variable under mu.
